messages.content: This is a counseling role-play system for providing feedback to counselors.
I feel like I’m constantly failing at work.
It sounds like you’re feeling overwhelmed and judged. Can you tell me more about these feelings? Feedback: Active Listening: 9/10, Empathy: 8/10, Open-Ended Questions: 7/10
This is a counseling role-play system for providing feedback to counselors.
Why don’t you try working harder?

That response might make the client feel invalidated. Try acknowledging their emotions first, like: 'It sounds like you’re feeling overwhelmed.' Feedback: Active Listening: 4/10, Empathy: 3/10, Open-Ended Questions: 5/10
This is a counseling role-play system for providing feedback to counselors.
I feel like my manager is always criticizing me.
You’re saying that your manager’s criticism is a significant source of stress. Can you share a recent example? Feedback: Active Listening: 10/10, Empathy: 9/10, Open-Ended Questions: 9/10
This is a counseling role-play system for providing feedback to counselors.
I can’t handle the stress of balancing work and family.
It sounds like you’re feeling torn between work and family commitments. What’s been the most challenging part for you? Feedback: Active Listening: 9/10, Empathy: 8/10, Open-Ended Questions: 8/10
This is a counseling role-play system for providing feedback to counselors.
I always feel like my parents are disappointed in me.

It seems like you’re carrying a heavy burden of trying to meet your parents’ expectations. Could you share more about these feelings? Feedback: Active Listening: 9/10, Empathy: 9/10, Open-Ended Questions: 8/10
This is a counseling role-play system for providing feedback to counselors.
Nobody understands what I’m going through.
It sounds like you’re feeling isolated and misunderstood. Can you describe what’s been happening? Feedback: Active Listening: 8/10, Empathy: 8/10, Open-Ended Questions: 7/10
This is a counseling role-play system for providing feedback to counselors.
I feel like I’ll never be good enough no matter what I do.
It seems like you’re struggling with feelings of inadequacy. Can you tell me about a time when you felt this way? Feedback: Active Listening: 10/10, Empathy: 9/10, Open-Ended Questions: 8/10
This is a counseling role-play system for providing feedback to counselors.
I don’t know if I can keep up with my responsibilities.
It sounds like you’re feeling overwhelmed by your responsibilities. What’s been the hardest part for you recently? Feedback: Active Listening: 9/10, Empathy: 8/10, Open-Ended Questions: 8/10
This is a counseling role-play system for providing feedback to counselors.
I’m afraid of letting everyone down.
It seems like you’re worried about not meeting others’ expectations. Can you share more about where this fear comes from? Feedback: Active Listening: 9/10, Empathy: 9/10, Open-Ended Questions: 8/10
This is a counseling role-play system for providing feedback to counselors.
I’m struggling to make decisions and feel confident about them.

It sounds like decision-making has been particularly challenging for you. Can you tell me about a recent decision you struggled with? Feedback: Active Listening: 8/10, Empathy: 8/10, Open-Ended Questions: 8/10
